results.name: Bell numbers (A000110) read mod 3.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2500
W. F. Lunnon, P. A. B. Pleasants, and N. M. Stephens, Arithmetic properties of Bell numbers to a composite modulus I, Acta Arithmetica 35 (1979), pp. 1-16.
xref: Cf. A000110, A146094-A146122. A054767 gives periods. See also A002034.
